public class PreparedStatementTableConverter
extends AbstractStatementConverter

Use a prepared statement to convert ordered maps into database insertions.

preparedStatementIsReusable

public boolean preparedStatementIsReusable()
Deprecated. 
Description copied from interface: IStatementConverter
Indicates whether returned PreparedStatement (from convert) can be reused multiple times. Default is false. It should return true if, for example a prepared statement is to be reused multiple times.

Specified by:
preparedStatementIsReusable in interface IStatementConverter
Overrides:
preparedStatementIsReusable in class AbstractStatementConverter

validate

public void validate(java.util.List exceptions,
                     Component comp)
Deprecated. 
Checks that the properties for the statement converter are valid. If any problems are found then an exception is raised and added to the supplied list.

Parameters:
exceptions - list of exceptions that any validation errors will be appended to
comp - the component that this converter is connected to

initialise

public void initialise(java.sql.Connection connection)
Deprecated. 
Description copied from interface: IStatementConverter
Do any initialisation required. Called with a valid connection once before convert is called. Calling this method again should reset and state.

Parameters:
connection -
